What is the NEORIS Knowledge Discovery Platform (KDP)?

The NEORIS Knowledge Discovery Platform (KDP) is an intelligent document processing platform integrated end-to-end in the customer journey. It combines distinct AI techniques like deep learning, natural language processing, computer vision, and semantic understanding to digitize complex documents, both structured and unstructured, in seconds.
